list_translation_mean.translate_mean: buộc vật gì bằng đai da

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a strip of leather, cloth, or other flexible material, often with a buckle, used to fasten, secure, or carry something or to hold onto something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dây đeo áo ngực của cô

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fasten or secure in a specified place or position with a strap or seat belt.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I had to strap the bag to my bicycle
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi phải buộc túi vào xe đạp của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: beat (someone) with a strip of leather.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I expected when my dad walked in that he'd strap him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi mong đợi khi cha tôi bước vào đó anh ta sẽ buộc anh ta
